snippet: Clive Romney, who gives tours of the Mormon Pioneer National Heritage Area, may be the Romney you want to speak with about the church and its roots in Utah.
abstract: Excerpts from a conversation with Clive Romney, distant cousin of Republican presidential nominee Mitt Romney, who promotes the history of the Mormon faith and of the state of Utah, as executive director of Utah Pioneer Heritage Arts.
lead_paragraph: Clive Romney, who gives tours of the Mormon Pioneer National Heritage Area, may be the Romney you want to speak with about the church and its roots in Utah.

keywords.value: Mormons (Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints)
keywords.name: subject
